text: Tasunku hugantone. Efraemi naga'mo'zama nemaniza rankumamoka, knare'nare kavasase zankamo nehigenka mani'nanke'za, Efraemi naga'mo'za aka ti nene'za zamavufaga erisga nehaze. Hagi ana rankumamoka tra'zamo knare avasase renteaza hunka, agona kaziga knare agupo mopafi hentofa waini hoza ante'nane. Hianagi kavufgama erisgama nehana zana, mago zupa zagemo traza te vamagiaza hunka haviza hugahane.
